verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:13
verses.text: Now Hannah, she spake in her heart; only her lips moved, but her voice was not heard: therefore Eli thought she had been drunken.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:14
verses.text: And Eli said unto her, How long wilt thou be drunken? put away thy wine from thee.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:15
verses.text: And Hannah answered and said, No, my lord, I am a woman of a sorrowful spirit: I have drunk neither wine nor strong drink, but have poured out my soul before the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:16
verses.text: Count not thine handmaid for a daughter of Belial: for out of the abundance of my complaint and grief have I spoken hitherto.
